price: The Day when We will gather the righteous before the Most Compassionate as honored guests,
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا
